connect.notInList: You are not in the list ?

dashboard.countdown: Time before the next round will be lunched
dashboard.waitingGrid: Waiting for the new grid to be generated ...
dashboard.getInGrid: Find a spot in the grid !

swapCar.title: Choose the driver you want to change your car with

swapPoint.title: Choose the driver you want to change your point during the next round

tutorial.seeRules: Click here to read the rules
tutorial.formatText:
The party begins at 4pm BST. The sessions are 6 minutes of practice and 12-15 minutes of races.
 A new race start every 30 minutes. We are usually doing 5-6 races in one evening.
 Starting grid is automatically determined by reverse of the championship order. Each car, track and weather are chosen randomly.
tutorial.customEventText: You have the ability to create you're own event. After clicking the following button, you can choose a track, a pool of car (individually or by class) and a weather.
tutorial.wheelText: Randomly during the party, the admin can roll the wheel of death. In this, you can find the name of each participant who created a custom event. Once someone is picked, the next race will follow the parameters set by these user.
tutorial.swapCarText: During the whole championship, you will have a determined number of jokers. This one, will make you swapped your car before the beginning of the next race. This is useful when you want to avoid trashes.
tutorial.swapPointText:
With this one, you can secretly choose a victim which will be forced to swap his pointe with you after the race. However there are basics rules : 
 - If your victim finish behind you, there is no swap. 
 - If you finish last, there is no swap (avoid extreme sand-bagging) 
 - You can only be the victim once in a championship
tutorial.leaderboardText: You can find the leaderboard and the result of each race at the bottom of the page.
